                        :op1 "Christian"))

            :op1 (d / divide-02
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person
                        :ARG0-of (m2 / mind-05

                                    :op1 "Republican"
                                    :op2 "Party"))))

                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 p2
                  :time (u / ultimate)))
      :manner (v / venture
            :mod (f / fund-01

            :quant (m3 / many)))
